title: Bug 6503Search page  should offer case sensitivity check box
description: Bug 6503Search pageshould offer case sensitivity check box
OB: Build 20011127Due to bug 6423 fix, the API SearchEngine.search(IWorkspace, String, int, int,IJavaSearchScope, IJavaSearchResultCollector) is now performing a caseinsensitive search (more intuitive).However, the UI page should offer a checkbox for case sensitivity, and ratheruse the following call to trigger the search:SearchEngine.search(workspace, createSearchPattern(patternString, searchFor,limitTo, caseSensitiveFlag), scope, resultCollector);
